sysevent_email_template.message_html:
${mail_script:get_updated_by_name} transferred ownership of an ATAT portfolio to you

${mail_script:get_updated_by_name} made you the owner of “${name}” portfolio within the Account Tracking and Automation Tool (ATAT). As the owner, you can now:

  • Track cloud usage and manage spending throughout the duration of the JWCC task order
  • Edit all portfolio details and add new task orders
  • Manage portfolio member access
  • Archive this portfolio

View portfolio: https://services.disa.mil/atat-dapps

This was sent from an unmonitored email address. Please do not reply to this email. If you have questions about JWCC or ATAT, please contact our Customer Support Team at https://community.hacc.mil/s/contact?&RoleType=Customer
sysevent_email_template.message_text:
${mail_script:get_updated_by_name} transferred ownership of an ATAT portfolio to you
${mail_script:get_updated_by_name} made you the owner of “${name}” within the Account Tracking and Automation Tool (ATAT). As the owner, you can now:
Track cloud usage and manage spending throughout the duration of the JWCC task order Edit all portfolio details, to include adding CSP administrators, requesting to modify task orders, and adding new task orders. Manage portfolio member access Archive this portfolio
sysevent_email_template.name: Portfolio Ownership Change
sysevent_email_template.subject: ATAT portfolio transfered to you: “${portfolio_owner.name}”
